name: qr-agent
description: QR Agent creates QR codes for user-defined urls and keeps track of their usage afterwards.

scripts.publish-azure-test: npm run publish-azure && XCOPY config.test.json dist\config.json* /Y && npm run zip-dist
scripts.publish-azure-prod: npm run publish-azure && XCOPY config.prod.json dist\config.json* /Y && npm run zip-dist
scripts.publish-azure: npm run build && XCOPY "azure-assets" "dist\" /E && npm run install-dist
scripts.build: npm run drop-dist && tsc && npm run copy-public
scripts.install-dist: XCOPY package.json dist\ /Y && cd dist && npm install --production

author: Dennis Janiak
